title: Bug 115960 - Datetime values retrieved from table show different format in dynamic text item and data/text item
OB: When retrieving datetime values from a table, they are displayed in a different format in dynamic text items and data/text items.
EB: The datetime values should be displayed in the same format in both dynamic text items and data/text items.
SR: To reproduce this issue: 1. Insert a text, data, or dynamic text item. 2. Retrieve datetime values from a table and display them in the inserted item.
